citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The last facility program review by the IACUC was done in March of 2021. It is essential that this program review be
conducted every 6 months in order to ensure the humane and judicious use of animals by the facility. The IACUC must
conduct a facility program review.
Correct by: 5/12/2022

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The last facility inspection by the IACUC was done in March of 2021. It is essential that this facility inspection be
conducted every 6 months in order to ensure the humane and judicious use of animals by the facility. The IACUC must
conduct a facility inspection.
Correct by: 5/12/2022

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The last report to the Institutional Official on the IACUC’s facility program review and facility inspection was done in March
of 2021. It is essential that this report be submitted every 6 months in order to ensure the Institutional Official is informed
and has knowledge of the facility. The IACUC must submit a report to the Institutional Official on its facility inspection and
program review.
Correct by: 5/12/2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(c)(1) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The last facility program review by the IACUC was done in March of 2021.  It is essential that this program review be 
conducted every 6 months in order to ensure the humane and judicious use of animals by the facility.  The IACUC must 
conduct a facility program review. 
Correct by:  5/12/2022 
2.31(c)(2) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The last facility inspection by the IACUC was done in March of 2021.  It is essential that this facility inspection be 
conducted every 6 months in order to ensure the humane and judicious use of animals by the facility.  The IACUC must 
conduct a facility inspection. 
Correct by:  5/12/2022 
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The last report to the Institutional Official on the IACUC’s facility program review and facility inspection was done in March 
of 2021.  It is essential that this report be submitted every 6 months in order to ensure the Institutional Official is informed

and has knowledge of the facility.  The IACUC must submit a report to the Institutional Official on its facility inspection and 
program review. 
Correct by:  5/12/2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
